permissions: Users can create a key result when they are authorized to create the related objective; if the objective is not present, policy defers to validation.
side_effects: Creates a key result, syncs objective dates when start/end dates are provided, may enqueue background jobs for title summary updates and completion posts, updates objective family status, triggers objective OpenAI file updates, and records key result changes.
validation_notes: --title and --objective are required. title must be present and unique within the same objective. completion-percentage must be between 0 and 1. end-on must be on or after start-on when both are set. owner must belong to the objective organization or its broker unless the owner is an admin. customer-success-responsible-person must be an admin. If the objective is a template, owner and customer-success-responsible-person must be blank and template titles must be unique. start-on and end-on use YYYY-MM-DD. completion-percentage of 1 sets status to completed.

flags.name: --customer-success-responsible-person
flags.description: Customer success responsible person user ID
